entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 10.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Temperature steady near minus 10. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 05 February 2023
